name: LIONESS (Regulatory Networks)
description:
LIONESS uses linear interpolation on perturbed PANDA-derived regulatory networks to infer sample-specific regulatory networks. Further information is available at https://www.cell.com/iscience/fulltext/S2589-0042(19)30087-2.
Note that if you want to use this tool for non-human data, you will need to first map to orthologous human genes due to LIONESS's dependence on human-derived TF motif and protein-protein interaction data.

mevLioness.exprs_file.description: The input matrix- a gene expression matrix for a cohort of samples.
mevLioness.exprs_file.name: Input matrix:

mevLioness.identifier_choice.description: Which gene identifiers are used in your expression matrix? Symbols correspond with common gene names while Ensembl identifiers start with ENSG.
mevLioness.identifier_choice.name: Gene identifier:
